    • Constructor Detail

      • GLTexture

        public GLTexture(Context context,
         java.lang.String atlasName,
         float spriteSize,
         float targetWidth,
         float targetHeight)
        Constructor for the texture atlas we are loading
        Parameters:
        context - active activity context
        atlasName - file name of the atlas stored under drawable
        spriteSize - ideal size of each sprite
        targetWidth - width, in pixels, that the atlas was drawn in
        targetHeight - height, in pixels, that the atlas was drawn in

      • GLTexture

        public GLTexture(Bitmap bmp,
         float spriteSize,
         float targetWidth,
         float targetHeight)
        Constructor for the texture atlas we are loading
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap we are using for the texture
        spriteSize - ideal size of each sprite
        targetWidth - width, in pixels, that the atlas was drawn in
        targetHeight - height, in pixels, that the atlas was drawn in
